slides.title: Galaxy Types
slides.content:
# Galaxy Types ðŸŒ€

## Spiral Galaxies
- Disk with spiral arms
- Young stars in arms
- Examples: Milky Way, Andromeda

## Elliptical Galaxies
- Sphere to football shaped
- Old, red stars
- Little gas/dust

## Irregular Galaxies
- No defined shape
- Often from collisions
- Examples: Magellanic Clouds

slides.title: Cosmic Microwave Background
slides.content:
# CMB ðŸ“¡

The afterglow of the Big Bang.

## Properties

| Property | Value |
|----------|-------|
| Temperature | 2.725 K |
| Age | 380,000 years after Big Bang |
| Uniformity | 99.999% |

## Why Microwaves?
Space expanded, stretching light from visible to microwave.

slides.title: Dark Matter and Energy
slides.content:
# Dark Matter and Energy ðŸŒ‘

## Universe Composition

| Component | Percentage |
|-----------|------------|
| Dark energy | 68% |
| Dark matter | 27% |
| Visible matter | 5% |

## Dark Matter
- Has gravity
- Does NOT emit light
- Detected via rotation curves

## Dark Energy
- Causes accelerating expansion
- Discovered 1998
